text: I changed the header graphic on Scripting News to an artist's rendering of the completion of the Transcontinental Railroad at Promontory Summit, Utah on May 10, 1869 and the ceremonial driving of the Golden Spike. I always loved the imagery of this event. A cooperative venture, one team building from east to the west, and the other from west to east, meeting at a middle point, and thereby creating one great thing. Working together. Built during the Civil War.
